name: Controller (CoolCat7)
description:
Destroy the mind's controller!

We investigated that someone is stealing people and restoring their intelligence for murder with special computer.

Destroy him and your enemies too.

To win you must kill enemies and one of the soldiers to come to the computer(this is red hexagon) 

Input:

  • Left mouse button - set position for soldiers
  • 'Escape' in menu - quit from the game

A game for Weekly Game Jam - week 216.

Music by Hinkik & A Himitsu - Realms (https://soundcloud.com/hinkik/realms)

P.S: This game in fact does not have a lot of content, and in general it is just an attempt to do at least something, but if you liked/not liked the idea of this game, then write in the comments! Thanks!!!
